summary: First hire of a startup company focused on helping retailers and brands engage with their customers through a permanent touchpoint on their smartphone.
In charge of designing, prototyping, building, deploying, maintaining all components of the SaaS solution, forming a tight duet with the CTO.

We keep an emphasis on the API-first quality of our service-oriented architecture, and focus on lean, continuous delivery to accomodate our customers while paving a stable ground for our own vision at scale. We keep our stack as ever-modern as possible, with strict organization and implementation standards, and rigorous testing.
Co-founder of a startup company aiming at establishing long-lasting trust between vehicle owners and the automotive industry, by providing modern online tooling to car garages and dealers.
Owning all infrastructure and software, with a sensible responsibility in product planning, I iteratively devised and executed a roadmap to build a prototype from the ground up.

After positive reaction from our early adopters, I led development of additional features and integration with industry-standard ERPs, while scaling the service for growth and bringing onboard our first hire, effectively transforming our idea into a seed-funded company.
